ModMetaData.name: Talking Isn't Everything
ModMetaData.author: cyanobot
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to make an inability to talk less crippling. A number toggleable options are provided to control what mute pawns can and can't do.

A pawn is "mute" if they are incapable of Talking (Talking 0% in the Health tab), whether that's due a genetic inability, injury, or any other reason. (Mute is not the same as Incapable of Social work - this mod does not change anything about pawns Incapable of Social.)

Features:
- New and adjusted log entries : The log will no longer describe mute pawns responding verbally to chit-chat, telling stories to babies, etc, etc.
- (Toggleable) Animal interactions : Talking is no longer required to tame or train animals.
- (Toggleable) Casual interactions : Allows mute pawns to maintain (or destroy) their social relationships using the same mechanics as any other pawn, but with new non-verbal log entries.
- (Toggleable) Romance : Mute pawns can initiate romance and propose marriage instead of waiting for their partner to do so.
- (Toggleable) Recruiting: Allows mute pawns to recruit prisoners to the colony.
- (Toggleable) Slavery: Allows mute pawns to enslave prisoners and suppress slaves.
- (Toggleable) Conversion: Allows mute pawns to use conversion interactions, abilities and rituals.
- (Toggleable) Trials: Allows mute pawns to use the Trial leader ability.
- (Toggleable) Speeches: Allows mute pawns to use Leader Speech and/or Throne Speech.
- (Toggleable) Teaching: Allows mute pawns to teach Biotech children at the school desk.

Regardless of enabled interactions, mute pawns will still have a very low Social Impact and Negotiation ability on account of their inability to talk.
